short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip the training videos on Skillsoft/skillport.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to skip training video playback on Skillsoft (hosted by skillport.com). A "Skip Video" button will be added on the skillsoft playback page. Use the "Skip Video" button or press key "s" to skip the training video.
